column3: “Silver Cindy is a potent sativa-dominant strain that launched me to the stars with the first exhale. Very smooth smoke with no cough.  A two-hour period elapsed from the time I medicated until I began to gently come down and I was not tired or lethargic afterward.  This strain has bag appeal; this batch anyway.  The nugs are dense, a light green with a lot of white, with orange hairs and a dusting of what looks like ...”
